rules.fullName: Update Restrict Redraw value in application to False
rules.formula: IF(PRIORVALUE(genesis__CL_Product__c) != genesis__CL_Product__c,( IF(genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Residential IO Bullet' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Vacant Land - Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Commercial' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Commercial IO Bullet',TRUE, FALSE)), FALSE)

rules.fullName: Update Restrict Redraw value in application to True
rules.formula: IF(ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(genesis__CL_Product__c),( IF(genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'SMSF Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'SMSF Commercial' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Retained Stock - Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Retained Stock - Commercial' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Non-Resident – Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Non-Resident - Commercial' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Highest & Best Use – Residential' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Highest & Best Use – Commercial' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Residential Construction' || genesis__CL_Product_Name__c == 'Construction Development',TRUE, FALSE)), FALSE)
